title: Arabic poetry encyclopedia
description:
this is the last version of Arabic poetry encyclopedia including:


- 3024 Arabian poets from pre-Islam era to mid of 20th century.

- 591 books of Arabic literature.

- 4 famous Arabic-Arabic dictionaries.

- 26 vocal records for some of famous Arabic poems.

- easy search engine inside encyclopedia tags.

please keep seeding

Saria
